about.description.content: This app is created to explore Angular 5 features. In the current state the app is in serverless mode.
about.description.title: Description
about.featuresExplored.description: Following features have been utilized by the app:
about.featuresExplored.features:
• TypeScript language and it's features
  • Angular components and modules
  • Angular services to pass data between unrelated components
  • Material design for Angular
  • Application routing
  • RxJS and Observable pattern
  • Angular forms: reactive forms
  • Custom form controls
  • SCSS markup-language
  • Angular themisation
about.featuresExplored.title: Angular 5 features exploited in project
about.installation.description: To install the app follow the steps below:
about.installation.steps:
• Install NodeJS using link https://nodejs.org/en/download/
  • From the command line install Angular 5: npm install -g @angular/cli
  • From the command line navigate to project directory and launch: ng serve
  • By default the application located at http://localhost:4200.
about.installation.title: Installation
about.title: About
about.contacts.title: Contacts

buyDialog.title: Buy "{itemTitle}"
buyDialog.description: To buy the item "{itemTitle}", please contact to seller {sellerName}. Tell them that you've found the item on Shadow Market.
howto.title: How To
howto.description.title: Description
howto.description.content: This article describes how to use Shadow Market app.
howto.buy.title: How to buy item
howto.buy.description: You don't buy an item directly from the app, rather have contact to seller so you can discuss final price and shipment options.
howto.buy.steps:
• Go to catalog
  • Chose item you like
  • If you want to accuire an item right away, you can click "Buy" button
  • In other case you can click "Details" to see item detailed description
  • Clicking "Buy" button brings the seller contact dialog
  • Contact the seller to negotiate a deal
howto.sell.title: How to sell item
howto.sell.description: To sell the item from Shadow Market follow the steps below:
howto.sell.steps:
• First you need to login to the app. For demo purposes, use existing user names mentioned on items without a password
  • Go to My Items section
  • Click "New Item" button
  • Set title, description, price and don't forget about photos
  • Click "Save" now you can see your item in the catalog so do other visitors
  • You can always update your item from My Items chosing you item
  • Don't forget to delete item as soon as you sell it. In My Items menu chose item to remove and use floating menu to the right
